attributes.action: instruct the DVLA to change the Driving Licence Counterpart to a portable format
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current Photocard is clearly sized for easy carriage in wallets etc.(being ISO7810/ID-1 format), yet the Counterpart is ISO216/A4 format, which is not.  As the Licence notionally consists of both parts, and it is fundamentally unpredictable when a Licence will be needed, logic dictates both parts should be no more than "wallet sized" (i.e. ISO7810/ID-1 or ID-2) to facilitate permanent carriage.
